name: The Wedding Monster!
description:
The Wedding Monster! is a platforming adventure game in which players take control of a box-shaped Cyclops in his journey to crash adorable weddings. If they don't want to invite him normally, they'll have to suffer the consequences of him showing up and wreaking havoc!

CREDITS

- Level Design and asset compilation by Max Truty

- Mechanics Code created by Michael Baker - University of Texas at Austin

- Wedding Asset Pack (all textures and decorations such as chairs, tables, rope, carpet) by Whodat

- Ornamental Flower Set (Flower Bunches) by Game Asset Studio

- Meshint Boximon Cyclops by Meshint Studio

- 3D Voxel Characters (Brides) by Mochimargo

- Music: Mushroom Dance from bensound

- Sound Effects: SFX_Jump_09 from envatoelements
